tables.name: seasoncharts_shows
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE seasoncharts_shows (scshowid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,season INT REFERENCES season(seasonid) UNIQUE,animeseason INT REFERENCES yearseason(yearseasonid) NOT NULL,year INT NOT NULL,continuing BOOLEAN,summary TEXT)

tables.name: seasoncharts_tags
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE seasoncharts_tags (sctagid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT UNIQUE,description TEXT,spoiler BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0)

tables.name: seasoncharts_showtags
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE seasoncharts_showtags (scshowtagid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,scshowid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES seasoncharts_shows(scshowid),sctagid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES seasoncharts_tags(sctagid),UNIQUE(scshowid,sctagid) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: seasoncharts_showimages
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE seasoncharts_showimages (scimageid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,scshowid INTEGER REFERENCES seasoncharts_shows(scschowid) NOT NULL,url TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE)

tables.name: seasoncharts_showaliases
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE seasoncharts_showaliases (seasonaliasid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,seasonalias TEXT NOT NULL,scshow INT NOT NULL REFERENCES seasoncharts_shows(scshowid),language TEXT)

tables.name: seasoncharts_siteids
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE seasoncharts_siteids (scchartidid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, scshowid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES seasoncharts_shows(scshowid), wmsiteid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES webmodules_website(mwsiteid), siteid TEXT NOT NULL, UNIQUE(scshowid,wmsiteid))
